results.title: Thrombotic microangiopathy as a complication in a patient with focal segmental glomerulosclerosis.
results.text_hl: We report on a 12-year-old female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Steroids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013256 @@@steroid@@@-dependent @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ due to @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulosclerosis_Focal_Segmental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005923 @@@focal segmental glomerulosclerosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Glomerulosclerosis_Focal_Segmental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005923 @@@FSGS@@@) since her 3rd year of life.

citations.NLM: Benz K, Amann K, Dittrich K, Dötsch J. Thrombotic microangiopathy as a complication in a patient with focal segmental glomerulosclerosis. Pediatr Nephrol. 2007 Dec;22(12):2125-8. PMID: 17882457
